00010 class ORIP320ADCDecoder: public ORVBasicTreeDecoder, public ORVIndustryPakDecoder
00011 {
00012   public:
00013     ORIP320ADCDecoder() {}
00014     virtual ~ORIP320ADCDecoder() {}
00015     enum EORIP320ADCConsts { kBufferHeaderLength = 3,
00016                              kMaxADCRecordsChannels = 40 };
00017     
00018    virtual inline size_t TotalADCValuesOf( UInt_t* record )
00019       { return ( LengthOf( record ) - kBufferHeaderLength <= 0 ) 
00020                  ? 0 : (size_t) ( LengthOf( record ) - kBufferHeaderLength ); } 
00021 
00023 
00026     virtual UInt_t ChannelOf( UInt_t* record, size_t offset )
00027     { return ( record[kBufferHeaderLength + offset] & 0xFF0000 ) >> 16; }
00028 
00030 
00033     virtual UInt_t ADCValueOf( UInt_t* record, size_t offset )
00034     { return ( record[kBufferHeaderLength + offset] & 0xFFF ); }
00035 
00046     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 6; }
00047     virtual std::string GetParName( size_t iPar );
00048     virtual inline size_t GetNRows( UInt_t* record )
00049       { return TotalADCValuesOf( record ); }
00050     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow);
00051     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() 
00052       { return "IP320:IP320ADC"; }  
00053     
00054 };
